parse.title: Ice troll
parse.text:
This article is about the ice trolls of the Troll Country. For elsewhere located ice trolls, see Ice troll (disambiguation).
For the variant encountered in Daemonheim, see Ice troll (Dungeoneering).

Ice trolls are monsters that are encountered in Desert Treasure when the player is trying to get the ice diamond from Kamil. Five or six of the trolls have to be killed to gain access to the ice cave on the eastern side.

It is recommended to kill the level 84s as they have fewer life points and lower Defence. Remember, as you are indeed beyond the ice gate, you will feel a slow drain of stats, so you will need a supply of super restore potions or restore potions and prayer potions. It is not recommended to kill these monsters after you have the ice diamond, as they can hit constant 200s without Protect from Melee.

Players can obtain a soul of a troll for the Slayer Codex from this creature when using an ushabti.

Rare drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.
